verses.verse: And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H5514>Sinai,<s%> in the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%> of the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> after they were <S%H3318>come<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>
Let the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> also <S%H6213>keep<s%> the <S%H6453>passover<s%> at his <S%H4150>appointed<s%> <S%H4150>season.<s%>

In the <S%H702>fourteenth<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H2320>month,<s%> <S%H996>at<s%> <S%H6153>even,<s%> you shall <S%H6213>keep<s%> it in his <S%H4150>appointed<s%> <S%H4150>season:<s%> according to <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2708>rites<s%> of it, and according to <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4941>ceremonies<s%> thereof, shall you <S%H6213>keep<s%> it.
And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> that they should <S%H6213>keep<s%> the <S%H6453>passover.<s%>

And they <S%H6213>kept<s%> the <S%H6453>passover<s%> on the <S%H702>fourteenth<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%> <S%H996>at<s%> <S%H6153>even<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H5514>Sinai:<s%> according to <S%H3605>all<s%> that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And there were certain <S%H582>men,<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> were <S%H2931>defiled<s%> by the <S%H5315>dead<s%> <S%H5315>body<s%> of a <S%H120>man,<s%> that they <S%H3201>could<s%> not <S%H6213>keep<s%> the <S%H6453>passover<s%> on that <S%H3117>day:<s%> and they <S%H7126>came<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H175>Aaron<s%> on that <S%H3117>day:<s%>

And <S%H1992>those<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to him, We are <S%H2931>defiled<s%> by the <S%H5315>dead<s%> <S%H5315>body<s%> of a <S%H120>man:<s%> <S%H4100>why<s%> are we <S%H1639>kept<s%> <S%H1639>back,<s%> that we may not <S%H7126>offer<s%> an <S%H7133>offering<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> in his <S%H4150>appointed<s%> <S%H4150>season<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel?<s%>
And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to them, <S%H5975>Stand<s%> still, and I will <S%H8085>hear<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will <S%H6680>command<s%> concerning you.
And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H1696>Speak<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3588>If<s%> <S%H376>any<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> of you or of your <S%H1755>posterity<s%> shall be <S%H2931>unclean<s%> by reason of a <S%H5315>dead<s%> <S%H5315>body,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> be in a <S%H1870>journey<s%> <S%H7350>afar<s%> off, yet he shall <S%H6213>keep<s%> the <S%H6453>passover<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

The <S%H702>fourteenth<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%> <S%H996>at<s%> <S%H6153>even<s%> they shall <S%H6213>keep<s%> it, and <S%H398>eat<s%> it with <S%H4682>unleavened<s%> bread and <S%H4844>bitter<s%> herbs.

They shall <S%H7604>leave<s%> <S%H3808>none<s%> of it to the <S%H1242>morning,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H7665>break<s%> any <S%H6106>bone<s%> of it: according to <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2708>ordinances<s%> of the <S%H6453>passover<s%> they shall <S%H6213>keep<s%> it.

But the <S%H376>man<s%> that is <S%H2889>clean,<s%> and is not in a <S%H1870>journey,<s%> and <S%H2308>declines<s%> to <S%H6213>keep<s%> the <S%H6453>passover,<s%> even the <S%H1931>same<s%> <S%H5315>soul<s%> shall be <S%H3772>cut<s%> off from among his <S%H5971>people:<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> he <S%H7126>brought<s%> not the <S%H7133>offering<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> in his <S%H4150>appointed<s%> <S%H4150>season,<s%> that <S%H376>man<s%> shall <S%H5375>bear<s%> his <S%H2399>sin.<s%>

And <S%H3588>if<s%> a <S%H1616>stranger<s%> shall <S%H1481>sojourn<s%> <S%H854>among<s%> you, and will <S%H6213>keep<s%> the <S%H6453>passover<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> according to the <S%H2708>ordinance<s%> of the <S%H6453>passover,<s%> and according to the <S%H4941>manner<s%> thereof, <S%H3651>so<s%> shall he <S%H6213>do:<s%> you shall <S%H1961>have<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H2708>ordinance,<s%> both for the <S%H1616>stranger,<s%> and for him that was <S%H249>born<s%> in the <S%H776>land.<s%>

And on the <S%H3117>day<s%> that the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> was <S%H6965>reared<s%> up the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> <S%H3680>covered<s%> the <S%H4908>tabernacle,<s%> namely, the <S%H168>tent<s%> of the <S%H5715>testimony:<s%> and at <S%H6153>even<s%> there was on the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> as it were the <S%H4758>appearance<s%> of <S%H784>fire,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H1242>morning.<s%>
<S%H3651>So<s%> it was <S%H8548>always:<s%> the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> <S%H3680>covered<s%> it by day, and the <S%H4758>appearance<s%> of <S%H784>fire<s%> by <S%H3915>night.<s%>

And <S%H6310>when<s%> the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> was <S%H5927>taken<s%> up from the <S%H168>tabernacle,<s%> then <S%H310>after<s%> that the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5265>journeyed:<s%> and in the <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> <S%H7931>stayed,<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H2583>pitched<s%> their tents.

<S%H5921>At<s%> the <S%H6310>commandment<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5265>journeyed,<s%> and <S%H5921>at<s%> the <S%H6310>commandment<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> they <S%H2583>pitched:<s%> as <S%H3117>long<s%> as the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> <S%H7931>stayed<s%> on the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> they <S%H2583>rested<s%> in their tents.

And when the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> <S%H748>tarried<s%> long on the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> then the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H8104>kept<s%> the <S%H4931>charge<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H5265>journeyed<s%> not.

And so it was, <S%H834>when<s%> the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> was a <S%H4557>few<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> on the <S%H4908>tabernacle;<s%> <S%H5921>according<s%> to the <S%H6310>commandment<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> they <S%H2583>stayed<s%> in their tents, and <S%H5921>according<s%> to the <S%H6310>commandment<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> they <S%H5265>journeyed.<s%>

And so it was, <S%H834>when<s%> the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> <S%H1961>stayed<s%> from <S%H6153>even<s%> to the <S%H1242>morning,<s%> and that the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> was <S%H5927>taken<s%> up in the <S%H1242>morning,<s%> then they <S%H5265>journeyed:<s%> <S%H176>whether<s%> it was by <S%H3119>day<s%> or by <S%H3915>night<s%> that the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> was <S%H5927>taken<s%> up, they <S%H5265>journeyed.<s%>

Or <S%H176>whether<s%> it were two <S%H3117>days,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> a <S%H2320>month,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> a <S%H3117>year,<s%> that the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> <S%H748>tarried<s%> on the <S%H4908>tabernacle,<s%> <S%H7931>remaining<s%> <S%H5921>thereon,<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H2583>stayed<s%> in their tents, and <S%H5265>journeyed<s%> not: but when it was <S%H5927>taken<s%> up, they <S%H5265>journeyed.<s%>

<S%H5921>At<s%> the <S%H6310>commandment<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> they <S%H2583>rested<s%> in the tents, and <S%H5921>at<s%> the <S%H6310>commandment<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> they <S%H5265>journeyed:<s%> they <S%H8104>kept<s%> the <S%H4931>charge<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H5921>at<s%> the <S%H6310>commandment<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> by the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>
